  "Initiated By" : "UNITED STATES SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION",
  "Allegations" : "SEC Admin Release 34-85704, IA Release  5225 / April 22, 2019: The Securities and Exchange Commission deems it appropriate and in the public interest that public administrative proceedings be instituted against Charles Myrick Winstead (\"Respondent\" or \"Winstead\"). After an investigation, the Division of Enforcement alleges that on January 22, 2018, a judgment of conviction was entered against Winstead based on his plea of guilty to one count of embezzlement in violation of Section 97-23- 19(d) of the Mississippi Code of 1972, before the Circuit Court of Madison County, Mississippi, in State of Mississippi v. Charles Myrick Winstead, Cause No. 2017-0386. On January 29, 2018, Winstead was sentenced to a prison term of 20 years, with the final 10 years suspended, and was ordered to pay restitution of $121,811.56.",
  "SanctionDetails" : [ ]
}
